column4: my runlevel 6 is broken, it doenst reboot the machine and gives me a prompt, and the reboot comand doesnt load the runlevel 6 script anymore, someone knows how to restore it?
does "telinit 6" work from the command line?
I think the reboot command is just a short cut to telinit 6 (changing runlvls) so be prepared if it works ;-)
